location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 430 x 352mm, on sheet 505 x 425mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume IV, and shows Mesopotamia and portions of Arabia and Persia, indicating boundaries, cities, towns, principal routes, railways and an oil pipeline. Some relief is shown with shading and sketch marks, and seas, rivers and marshes are printed in blue.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1927.
